message.content:
Here is a detailed breakdown of the information in the Executive Document Summary form. Following the breakdown, the results are presented in JSON format.

13. **Is there Nonrenewal Language in the Document?** No (checked)
14. **Is there a Termination for Convenience Clause in the Document?** Yes (checked)
15. **Will the Attached Document Involve Data Processing or Telecommunications Systems?** No (checked)
16. **Statutory Authority:** IC 5-2-6
17. **Description of Work and Justification for Spending Money:** "Contractor has been approved for an extension of funding through the Victims of Crime Act (VOCA) for the implementation of a program per VOCA guidelines."
18. **Justification of Vendor Selection and Determination of Price Reasonableness:** "Grant recipients were chosen on the basis of the quality and necessity of services described in their applications for state-wide efforts to provide services to victims of crime. Each proposal was reviewed by the ICJI Staff and recommendations were made in conjunction with the Victim Services Subcommittee to the Board of Trustees of the Indiana Criminal Justice Institute for final approval."
19. **If this Contract is Submitted Late, Please Explain Why:** None provided.
